body:
Tim,
Across all honeybee components, white balloons are used exclusively to give you more information about what is happening under the hood. Your simulation will still run perfectly fine and you only need to wprry about orange or red baloons. When we switch to the new graphic standards with the next LB+HB release, all of these whitw baloon messages will appear in the readme! Output of the component instead of a white baloon.
-Chris
